problem_names:
lemma CESem_simps:
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>  = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). CFn\<cdot>(\<Lambda> v. (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>))"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> App e x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>     = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<down>CFn \<rho> x|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Var x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>       = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). (\<rho>  x) \<cdot> r)"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Bool b \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>      = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). CB\<cdot>(Discr b))"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1 : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>  = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). CB_project\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r))"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Let as body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> = (\<Lambda> (C \<cdot> r). (\<N>\<lbrakk>body\<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>) \<cdot> r)"

lemma CESem_simps_no_tick:
  "(\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<sqsubseteq> CFn\<cdot>(\<Lambda> v. (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)"
  "(\<N>\<lbrakk> App e x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r    \<sqsubseteq> ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<down>CFn \<rho> x|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)\<cdot>r"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Var x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>         \<sqsubseteq> \<rho> x"
  "(\<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1 : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<sqsubseteq> CB_project\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Let as body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>   \<sqsubseteq>  \<N>\<lbrakk>body\<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>"
lemma CELam_no_restr: "(\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<sqsubseteq> CFn\<cdot>(\<Lambda> v. (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>))"
lemma CEApp_no_restr: "(\<N>\<lbrakk> App e x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r    \<sqsubseteq> ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<down>CFn \<rho> x)\<cdot>r"
translations:
lemma CESem_simps:
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>  = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). CFn\<cdot>(\<Lambda> v. (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>))"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> App e x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>     = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<down>CFn \<rho> x|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Var x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>       = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). (\<rho>  x) \<cdot> r)"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Bool b \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>      = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). CB\<cdot>(Discr b))"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1 : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>  = (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). CB_project\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r))"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Let as body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> = (\<Lambda> (C \<cdot> r). (\<N>\<lbrakk>body\<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>) \<cdot> r)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> =
     (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r).
         CFn\<cdot>
         (\<Lambda> v.
             (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>
              (x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)) &&&
     \<N>\<lbrakk> App e x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> =
     (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r).
         ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
          r \<down>CFn
          \<rho> x|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)\<cdot>
         r) &&&
     \<N>\<lbrakk> Var x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> =
     (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). \<rho> x\<cdot>r)) &&&
    \<N>\<lbrakk> Bool b \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> =
    (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r). CB\<cdot>(Discr b)) &&&
    \<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1
                   : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> =
    (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r).
        CB_project\<cdot>
        ((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
         r)\<cdot>
        ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
         r)\<cdot>
        ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
         r)) &&&
    \<N>\<lbrakk> Terms.Let as body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> =
    (\<Lambda> (C\<cdot>r).
        (\<N>\<lbrakk> body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
        r)
by (auto simp add: eta_cfun)
lemma CESem_bot[simp]:"(\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<sigma>\<^esub>)\<cdot>\<bottom> = \<bottom>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<sigma>\<^esub>)\<cdot>\<bottom> =
    \<bottom>
by (nominal_induct e arbitrary: \<sigma> rule: exp_strong_induct) auto
lemma CHSem_bot[simp]:"((\<N>\<lbrace> \<Gamma> \<rbrace>) x)\<cdot>\<bottom> = \<bottom>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrace>\<Gamma>\<rbrace>) x\<cdot>\<bottom> = \<bottom>
by (cases "x \<in> domA \<Gamma>") (auto simp add: lookup_HSem_heap lookup_HSem_other)

text \<open>
Sometimes we do not care much about the resource usage and just want a simpler formula.
\<close>

lemma CESem_simps_no_tick:
  "(\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<sqsubseteq> CFn\<cdot>(\<Lambda> v. (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)"
  "(\<N>\<lbrakk> App e x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r    \<sqsubseteq> ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<down>CFn \<rho> x|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)\<cdot>r"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Var x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>         \<sqsubseteq> \<rho> x"
  "(\<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1 : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<sqsubseteq> CB_project\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)"
  "\<N>\<lbrakk> Let as body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>   \<sqsubseteq>  \<N>\<lbrakk>body\<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
     r \<sqsubseteq>
     CFn\<cdot>
     (\<Lambda> v.
         (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>
          (x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>) &&&
     (\<N>\<lbrakk> App e x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
     r \<sqsubseteq>
     ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<down>CFn
      \<rho> x|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)\<cdot>
     r) &&&
    \<N>\<lbrakk> Var x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<rho> x &&&
    (\<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1
                    : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CB_project\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
     r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r) &&&
    \<N>\<lbrakk> Terms.Let as
                   body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<N>\<lbrakk> body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>
apply -

proof (prove)
goal (5 subgoals):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v.
        (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>
         (x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)
 2. (\<N>\<lbrakk> App e x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<down>CFn
     \<rho> x|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r
 3. \<N>\<lbrakk> Var x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<rho> x
 4. (\<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1
                    : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CB_project\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
     r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)
 5. \<N>\<lbrakk> Terms.Let as
                   body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<N>\<lbrakk> body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>
apply (rule below_trans[OF monofun_cfun_arg[OF below_C]], simp)

proof (prove)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> App e x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<down>CFn
     \<rho> x|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r
 2. \<N>\<lbrakk> Var x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<rho> x
 3. (\<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1
                    : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CB_project\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
     r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)
 4. \<N>\<lbrakk> Terms.Let as
                   body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<N>\<lbrakk> body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>
apply (rule below_trans[OF monofun_cfun_arg[OF below_C]], simp)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<N>\<lbrakk> Var x \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<rho> x
 2. (\<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1
                    : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CB_project\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
     r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)
 3. \<N>\<lbrakk> Terms.Let as
                   body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<N>\<lbrakk> body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>
apply (rule cfun_belowI, rule below_trans[OF monofun_cfun_arg[OF below_C]], simp)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> (scrut ? e\<^sub>1
                    : e\<^sub>2) \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CB_project\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> scrut \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>1 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
     r)\<cdot>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e\<^sub>2 \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r)
 2. \<N>\<lbrakk> Terms.Let as
                   body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<N>\<lbrakk> body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>
apply (rule below_trans[OF monofun_cfun_arg[OF below_C]], simp)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<N>\<lbrakk> Terms.Let as
                   body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub> \<sqsubseteq>
    \<N>\<lbrakk> body \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<N>\<lbrace>as\<rbrace>\<rho>\<^esub>
apply (rule cfun_belowI, rule below_trans[OF monofun_cfun_arg[OF below_C]], simp)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
lemma CELam_no_restr: "(\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<sqsubseteq> CFn\<cdot>(\<Lambda> v. (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)
have "(\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<sqsubseteq> CFn\<cdot>(\<Lambda> v. (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v.
        (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>
         (x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)
by (rule CESem_simps_no_tick)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
  r \<sqsubseteq>
  CFn\<cdot>
  (\<Lambda> v.
      (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>
       (x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)
also

proof (state)
this:
  (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
  r \<sqsubseteq>
  CFn\<cdot>
  (\<Lambda> v.
      (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>
       (x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)
have "\<dots> \<sqsubseteq> CFn\<cdot>(\<Lambda> v. (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v.
        (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>
         (x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>) \<sqsubseteq>
    CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)
by (intro cont2cont monofun_LAM below_trans[OF C_restr_below] monofun_cfun_arg below_refl fun_upd_mono)

proof (state)
this:
  CFn\<cdot>
  (\<Lambda> v.
      (\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>
       (x := v)\<^esub>)|\<^bsub>r\<^esub>) \<sqsubseteq>
  CFn\<cdot>
  (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  cont (\<lambda>a. a) \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
  r \<sqsubseteq>
  CFn\<cdot>
  (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  cont (\<lambda>a. a) \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
  r \<sqsubseteq>
  CFn\<cdot>
  (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
    r \<sqsubseteq>
    CFn\<cdot>
    (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)
by this (intro cont2cont)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<N>\<lbrakk> Lam [x]. e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>
  r \<sqsubseteq>
  CFn\<cdot>
  (\<Lambda> v. \<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>(x := v)\<^esub>)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (prove)

    r \<sqsubseteq>
    ((\<N>\<lbrakk> e \<rbrakk>\<^bsub>\<rho>\<^esub>)\<cdot>r \<down>CFn
     \<rho> x)\<cdot>
    r
